translations: [分子生物] 胶束；[生物] 微团

sentences.sentence: The effect of dimethyl sulphoxide(DMSO)on micelle conformation of hexadecyltrimethylammonium bromide(CTAB)was studied by means of surface tension.
sentences.translation: 通过表面张力法研究了二甲基亚砜（ DMSO）对十六烷基三甲基溴化铵（ CTAB）胶束形成的影响。

sentences.sentence: The reverse micelle is produced by surfactant in the organic solvent.
sentences.translation: 反胶团是表面活性剂在有机溶剂中形成的。

sentences.sentence: Polymeric micelle has its own unique advantages with respect to drug delivery.
sentences.translation: 聚合物胶束作为药物载体具有其独特的优势。
